data.title: May 2019 News
data.text:
An experimental seminar coopted paintings, poetry, and hip-hop music to teach physics to undergraduate students, who created art projects from the concepts that they learned...

Wright Lab Director and professor of physics Karsten Heeger has been appointed chair of the Yale University Department of Physics. His term will be for three years, effective...
